text: Netoto khwahelesia Musa eshitabu mana nikhumulondiakhwo Abarumwa, inyuma wuwe, Nenikhuhelesia Isa omwana wa Mariamu abifune biahabulafu, mana nikhumuramwo amani ka roho omulafu (Jibril) Mana enywe olwa Abarumwa babetselanga nende akemioyo chienyu chilachamile tawe, mufura, ne omukanda mulala nimukufukula ne ukundi nimukwira
